title: 100 Cupboards
description: Twelve-year-old Henry York wakes up one night to find bits of plaster in his hair. Two knobs have broken through the wall above his bed and one of them is slowly turning . . . Henry scrapes the plaster off the wall and discovers cupboards of all different sizes and shapes. Through one he can hear the sound of falling rain. Through another he sees a glowing room â€” with a man pacing back and forth! Henry soon understands that these are not just cupboards, but portals to other worlds.
author: N.D. Wilson
